data.title: Dev 2DGame with Python
data.excerpt: Developing 2D Game with Python Arcade Library
data.rawBody:
---
title: Dev 2DGame with Python
excerpt: Developing 2D Game with Python Arcade Library
---

## Solutions

2DGame engines in Python language could be named just a few:

- [Pygame](https://www.pygame.org/wiki/GettingStarted), the most popular python game engine.
- [pyglet](http://pyglet.org/), windowing and multimedia library for Windows, Mac OS X and Linux.
- [Arcade](https://arcade.academy/), simillar to Pygame but more easier and engine-like rather than a primitive library.

## Why choose Arcade

- Rich and well Organized documatation
- Tons of [examples](https://arcade.academy/examples/index.html)
- Beginner Friendly [API](https://arcade.academy/arcade.html)
- [More suitable for education](https://learn.arcade.academy/)
